item.title: MMM
item.description: score:-54 Chances: 3M Co. management had some excellent news for investors this week, indicating positive developments within the company. First-quarter results are trending better than expected, indicating potential growth in the near term. Risks: 3M Co. is facing mounting legal liabilities and a much-diminished stock price, which could pose a risk to investors.
